description:
This seminar explores an aspect of medieval literature intensively; specific course topics will vary from year to year. Topics in the past have included the medieval performance, medieval women, and medieval law and literature. 

See the English Department's website at www.english.upenn.edu for a description of the current offerings.
name: London in Literature in the Middle Ages and the Renaissance

section.name: London in Literature in the Middle Ages and the Renaissance

values.name: London in Literature in the Middle Ages and the Renaissance
